name: All Hallows' Eve 1881
description:
The year is 1881. A friend has written to you from the village of Winterslow regarding the disappearance of children and a series of disturbing events emanating from the home of Lydia Shears, who many hold to be a practitioner of witchcraft. You have been summoned to investigate the case of the missing children and to resolve whatever situation you may discover. You arrive at the gates to the Shears estate on All Hallows' Eve. Pray you return before midnight...

All Hallows' Eve 1881 is a classic 80's-style text adventure for the 48k ZX Spectrum. You must navigate the Shears estate and use the various clues and items you find to solve the mystery of the missing children.

This is my first release for the ZX Spectrum. The game is designed to be accessible even for players new to the text adventure genre. All feedback is welcome!
